price: Onyankopͻn, awurade foforͻ biara nnihͻ gyesε Ɔno nko ara. Ɔno na abodin pa nyinaa wͻ no.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ لَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa lahu al-asmāu al-ḥus'nā
